name: Calls.AI -Pro Caller ID, Free CRM & Sales Tracking
description: Calls.AI is a powerful Caller ID app that provides powerful insights about callers and allows you to add notes, tasks, reminders, and follow-ups to any phone call.  Caller ID for Professionals - Identify unknown phone calls. - Turn phone calls into leads, customers, and arrange by smart tags. - Block annoying robocalls, spam calls, and telemarketers. - View rich caller ID details directly from the apps call log.  Caller Insights - Get rich insights about callers with one tap. - Discover everything about people who call you. - View social profiles, job description, and company details. - Get to know your clients and create great relationships.   Tasks, Reminders & Follow-ups - Create tasks, reminders & follow-ups directly from phone calls. - Never miss an opportunity to turn a lead or customer. - Link tasks, reminders, and follow-ups to phone calls. - Add tasks & follow-ups to any phone contact.  Call Notes - Quickly add a summary of phone calls. - View related notes on the call screen. - Make better relationships with potential customers.  Smart Tags for Contacts - Turn phone calls into leads or customers. - Arrange callers & contacts by groups. - Just like your personal CRM.  Got feedback or want to learn more about Calls.AI? Write to support@sync.ai or go to https://www.sync.ai
